How Personal Information is Collected\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM obtains most of your personal data through the forms and applications that you fill out in connection with your employment or its termination, for example, if you fill out a job application. In addition, EPAM may obtain personal data about you from other sources, for example,Â  the results of background checks or drug screenings (if any).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
